name: Darklands
notes:
Requires the latest version of GOG's Linux installer.
Uses game data from GOG with DOSBox from Lutris.

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxDarklands.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/Game/dosboxDarklands.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
main_file: dosboxDarklands_single.conf
